item.title: US-380 East at NM-37
item.description: US-380 east at NM-37 south, in Lincoln County.

item.title: US-380 East at NM-37
item.description: US-380 east at NM-37. Use NM-37 south for Nogal and Ruidoso. Continue east on US-380 for Capitan.

item.title: US-380 East Approaching NM-37
item.description: US-380 east approaching NM-37 south to Ruidoso.

item.title: US-380 East Approaching NM-37
item.description: US-380 east approaching NM-37.

item.title: US-54 North at US-380
item.description: US-54 north at US-380. Turn right for US-380 east to Capitan; left for US-380 west to San Antonio. Continue north for US-54 to Vaughn.

item.title: US-54 North Approaching US-380
item.description: US-54 north approaching US-380 in Carrizozo. Turn left for Valley of Fires State Recreation Area.

item.title: US-380 East at US-54
item.description: US-380 east at US-54 junction in Carrizozo.

item.title: US-380 East at US-54
item.description: US-380 east at US-54. Turn right on US-54 south to Tularosa; turn left on US-54 north to Vaughn. Continue straight on US-380 east for Capitan.

item.title: US-380 East Approaching US-54
item.description: US-380 east approaching US-54 in Carrizozo.

item.title: US-380 East Approaching US-54
item.description: US-380 east approaching US-54 in Carrizozo.

item.title: US-380 East - Carrizozo City Limits
item.description: Carrizozo City Limits on US-380 east. Carrizozo is the county seat of Lincoln County.

item.title: US-380 East - Billy The Kid Country
item.description: Billy The Kid Country marker on US-380 east approaching Carrizozo. Distance to Lincoln State Mounument, and Smokey Bear State Park.

item.title: US-380 East - Lincoln County
item.description: Entering Lincoln County on US-380 east. Typically New Mexico county line signs have, have the text County Line beneath the county name.

item.title: US-380 East - Tularosa Valley Watershed
item.description: Entering the Tularosa Valley Watershed on US-380 east. The Tularosa Valley is a closed basin and does not flow to the sea.

item.title: US-380 East at NM-1
item.description: US-380 east at NM-1 junction in San Antonio. NM-1 parallels I-25 between Truth of Consequences and Socorro.

item.title: US-380 East Approaching NM-1
item.description: US-380 east approaching NM-1 in San Antonio.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 139
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 139 - US-380 East/San Antonio/Carrizozo. This is the western terminus of US-380.

item.title: I-25 North Approaching US-380
item.description: I-25 north approaching US-380 (Exit 139). Use US-380 east for Smokey Bear Historical Park, and Lincoln State Monument.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 139
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 139 - US-380 East/San Antonio/Carrizozo.

item.title: US-380 East at NM-457
item.description: US-380 east at NM-457 south.

item.title: US-380 East - Lea County Line
item.description: Lea County Line on US-380 east.

item.title: US-380 East at NM-172
item.description: US-380 east at NM-172 south.

item.title: US-380 Approaching NM-172
item.description: US-380 approaching NM-172 junction.

item.title: US-380 East at NM-409
item.description: US-380 east at NM-409 south to Bottomless Lakes State Park.

item.title: US-380 East - NM-254
item.description: US-380 east at NM-254 junction.

item.title: US-380 East at NM-256
item.description: US-380 east at NM-256 junction (Atkinson Ave.)

item.title: US-380 East Approaching NM-256
item.description: US-380 east approaching NM-256 junction.

item.title: US-380 East at Main St.
item.description: US-380 east at Main St. Turn right for Main St. south to US-285/Artesia; turn left for Main St. to US-285/Vaughn. Continue east for US-380 to Tatum.

item.title: US-380 West at Main St.
item.description: US-380 west at Main St. Turn right for Main St. (to US-285 North) to Vaughn. Turn left for Main St. (to US-285 South) to Artesia. Continue west for US-380 (to US-70) to Ruidoso.

item.title: Main St. North at US-380
item.description: Main St. North at US-380. Turn right on US-380 east for Tatum, left on US-380 west (to US-70 west) for Ruidoso. Continue north on Main St. for US-285 north to Vaughn.

item.title: Main St. North at US-380
item.description: Main St. North at US-380 junction. US-70 used to run along US-380 and Main St. before the Relief Route was completed.

item.title: Main St. North at US-380
item.description: Main St. North at US-380 junction. US-70 used to run along US-380 through Roswell until the Roswell Relief Route was completed. Main St. was the former route of US-285, although there are still US-285 markers along Main St.

item.title: US-285 North - Roswell Relief Route
item.description: US-285 north at the southern end of the Roswell Relief Route. For US-285 North, US-380 West, and US-70, this is the truck route around the city. Officially, US-285 runs along the relief route, although there are US-285 markers along the old segment through Roswell.
